name: Kaine / Kainé (NieR Replicant) LoRA
description:
Kainé (NieR Replicant) LoRA

Turn off safe browsing to see the full gallery

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Another difficult one as she has a very odd outfit and the dataset wasn't really too much consistent. In the end I found the right combination to get her accurately enough.

Suggested weight is 0.5 or 0.6 and triggers with kaine \(nier\) and her outfit/hair description. This lora wil ladd all those concepts to your anime models. Examples have been made with Anything v4.5 and Counterfeit V2.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
